thread.title: 1st ODI: Rohit's 150 in vain as SA seal thrilling win
thread.title_full: 1st ODI: Rohit's 150 in vain as SA seal thrilling win

title: 1st ODI: Rohit's 150 in vain as SA seal thrilling win
text:
Cricket Ind vs SA, 1st ODI: Rohit's 150 in vain as SA seal thrilling win Chasing 304, Rohit Sharma scored a brilliant 150 but South Africa riding on Rabada's last over sealed a thrilling five-run win to lead the five-match series 1-0. IANS | Kanpur, October 11, 2015 | UPDATED 17:54 IST Mail A+ A- Rabada's last over strikes helped South Africa to win. (Reuters Photo) 
India suffered a five-run defeat against South Africa in their first of the five-match one-day international (ODI) series at the Green Park stadium on Sunday. 
Skipper AB de Villier's attacking 104 not out - 21st ODI century - powered South Africa to 303 for 5. In reply, Rohit Sharma's 133-ball 150 - his eighth ODI ton - took India close to the target, but South African bowlers held their nerves to register the slender five-run victory. 
For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
